name: Loop Lock Malfunction
description:
⚠ WARNING! LOOP LOCK MALFUNCTION!

It’s time to break out of the loop you’re imprisoned in! Destroy all the enemies in the facility, collect powerups to assist you along the way, and get the maximum score you can!

What’s you’re best score? Leave it in the comments! 

Changelog

1.0.1

  • Fixed lag spikes (and overall performance) in WebGL
  • Fixed pickups not getting cleaned up when the level resets
